title: Under A Dying Moon
description: In this third book in the Coastal Coffee Club Mysteries series, a girl washes up on the sleepy coastal town's beach and two women are found murdered. Eleanor and her coffee club friends find themselves in another investigation, but are they also suspects? What is the deal with the mysterious ruby ring that seems to follow Eleanor? And who are these new people in town and what are they after? Has Feathers, the parrot found true love? Will Angus and Eleanor resolve their romantic differences?
author: Patricia Brown
